speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh my god. Oh my god. Excuse me. Move! Move! Emergency! Excuse me!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Rach!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, there you are! Hi! Oh, so, so, how was China, you?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: It was, it was great. Oh, what happened?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: You're bleeding.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: I am? Oh, look at that, yes I am. Enough about me, enough about me, Mr. Back from the Orient. Come on. I wanna hear everything! Everything.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Well, where do I start? This is Julie. Julie, this is Rachel.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: These are, these aren't for you. These are for you. Welcome to our country.

speaker: ['Julie']
transcript: Thank you. I'm from New York.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Ok, well, not a problem. We'll just use them to stop the bleeding. Ok. Baggage claim? Ok.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey, Rach, can I get some coffee?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Yeah, sure.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Thank you.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, Rach, can I get...

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Did you talk to him?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Not yet.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Then, no.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: So what the hell happened to you in China? I mean, when last we left you, you were totally in love with, you know.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I know, I know I was, but there was always this little voice inside that kept saying it's never gonna happen, move on. You know whose voice that was?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: God?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: It was you, pal.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Well, maybe it was God, doing me.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Look, you were right. She looks at me and sees a friend, that's all. But then I met Julie, and I don't know, we're havin' a great time. And I have to say, I never would've gone for it with her if it hadn't been for you.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Well, you owe me one, big guy.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Here's your lemonade.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I didn't order lemonade.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh. Well then, you better go take that back because they're gonna charge you for that.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: But...

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Go-go-go-go, come on! So uh, what did you find out?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: He said...he said, he said that they're having a great time. I'm sorry. But, the silver lining, if you wanna see it, is that he made the decision all by himself! Without any outside help whatsoever.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: How is that the silver lining?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: You have to really wanna see it.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: You know, I think I was sixteen.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Please, just a little bit off the back.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I'm still on "no."

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Uh, morning. Do you guys think you could close your eyes for just a sec?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: No-no-no-no-no, I'm not fallin' for that again.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: What's goin' on?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, I sorta did a stupid thing last night.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: What stupid thing did you do?

speaker: ['Paulo']
transcript: Bon giorno tutti!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Ewww!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: All right, that's it, I quit.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: What? I didn't say anything.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Yeah, but this isn't the face of a person who trusts a person. Ok, this is the face of a person who, you know, doesn't trust a person.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I'm sorry. I'm sorry, Phoebe. It's just a little shorter than what we had discussed.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Would you relax? I know what I am doing. This is how he wears it.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: How who wears it?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Demi Moore.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Demi Moore is not a he.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Well, he was a he in Arthur, and in Ten.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: That's Dudley Moore. I said I wanted it like Demi Moore.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh. Oh!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh my God!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh my God!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh my God!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh my God! I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Which one's Demi Moore?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: She's the actress that was in Disclosure, Indecent Proposal, Ghost!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, she's got gorgeous hair.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I know!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Even Mary Tyler Moore would've been better.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I like it. I do, I think it's a Ten.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Thank you. My hair is very amused.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Come on, Monica, things could be worse. You could get caught between the moon and New York City. I know it's crazy, but it's true.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Thank you.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Well, I gotta go. Bye. Bye, Rach.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Wait, are you leaving?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah, that's kinda what I meant by "bye!"

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, can I talk to you for a sec?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Okay.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey, when the doctor does that hernia test...

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: That's ok.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: What's goin' on?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, first of all, Paulo and I are not back together. It was just a stupid thing I did, and if I could go back in time and do it again, well, I wouldn't. Um, second of all , what?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Ok. Well, before I say anything, I just need to know, is this one of those things where you break up with a guy, and then I tell you what I think, and then the next day you get back together with the guy, and I look like a complete idiot?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: No. No-no-no-no.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Well, then, I think, I think the guy is scum. I hate him. I mean I actuallyI-I physically hate him. I always have. You are way too good to be with a guy like that.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Really?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: You deserve to be with someone who appreciates you, and who gets how funny and sweet and amazing, and adorable, and sexy you are, you know? Someone who wakes up every morning thinking "Oh my god, I'm with Rachel". You know, someone who makes you feel good, the way I am with Julie. Was there a second of all?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: No, I think that was the whole all.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Okay. Okay. Okay.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I swear to god, Dad. That's not how they measure pants.

speaker: ['Julie']
transcript: I was thinking of doing it a little shorter, you know, like Andie McDowell's new haircut?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh yeah! Oh, I can do that.

speaker: ['Julie']
transcript: Really?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: You wanna do it right now?

speaker: ['Julie']
transcript: Great!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Ok, I just wanna be really sure this time. Andie McDowell's the girl from Four Weddings and a Funeral, right?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: No. No no no no no. That's Rodney McDowell. Andie McDowell is the guy from Planet of the Apes.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh, yeah. Ok, thank you.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: You're welcome.
